contentfulEvent.title: Open Hardware Summit 2024
contentfulEvent.location: Concordia University and LESPACEMAKER; Montreal, Canada

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The 2024 Open Hardware Summit took place ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"May 3 & 4, 2024","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" at Concordia University and LESPACEMAKER in Montreal, Canada","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Open Hardware Summit is the annual conference organized by the ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"http://oshwa.org/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Open Source Hardware Association","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" a 501(c)(3) not for profit charity. It is the worldâ€™s first comprehensive conference on open hardware; a venue and community in which we discuss and draw attention to the rapidly growing Open Source Hardware movement.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Speakers included world renowned leaders from industry, academia, the arts and maker community. Talks cover a wide range of subjects from electronics, mechanics to related fields such as digital fabrication, fashion technology, self-quantification devices, and IP law. As a microcosm of the Open Source Hardware community, the Summit provides an annual friendly forum for the community.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Open Hardware Summit was founded in 2010 by Alicia Gibb and Ayah Bdeir with support from Peter Semmelhack and Bug Labs in its founding years.
